item.title: Extinction Seed
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Extinction Seed

That is now. Countdown to extinction has begun. The doomsday clock is ticking. The sensational Sixties: the Beatles’ invasion unites the world while invasions in southeast Asia divide it. A very clever thief steals an ancient Akkadian cylinder concealing a dreaded secret. A sheltered, brilliant student awakens in chains over an ancient sacrificial altar. A White House operative’s assistant is witness to the prototype test of unofficially nonexistent technology. New York, 2010: A reporter starts connecting dots and comes to the terrifying conclusion that something weird is happening out there and it may be too late to stop it coming here.

Gore

Horror fantasy extremely grotesque and satirical biting aftertaste.

Set in a Venice of ‘700 during the carnival, a perfect stage for the gruesome murders committed by sadistic storybook characters that move and hide behind the masks too oblivious of the crowd.

Mediterranea

Winged creatures from east threaten the peace of this kingdom, slaughtering anything that comes between them and their goal. Alonissoâ€™s nightmares seem to be somehow connected to these mysterious enemies. But not even the wise Auraki seems know.

item.title: Route Des Maisons Rouges
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Route des Maisons Rouges

Sexy comedy and a surreal parody with a satirical taste. The setting is an imaginary Paris, in a particular neighborhood where there are five brothels. The tenants, not only sexy but very fiery temperament, take on “battle” to impose the power of their maison on the others. But when it comes to the grotesque and slimy mayor, the girls will be able to bury the hatchet and gang up on the common enemy.

ç›¸å…³ç§å­â¬‡Related Torrents
